summary: My 3 rd release on Nexus, this being the 1 st exclusive release on the site, Breton Followers
descriptionHtml:
Young Breton ladies to travel with you on your journeys through out Skyrim, let Dayla show you her wild side, let Lay Lola charm herself into your world, let Elizabeth go off on your enemies and burn them crisp, Daleana enjoys a good hunt, let Lizzy Borden " I know what you're thinking" does she have an axe, hell yea she s got an axe, a very powerful axe. Watch her chop your enemies up.Â
